title: Rum and Coconut Water Recipe
full_text:
Rum and Coconut Water Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
amber rum
4
ounces
chilled
coconut water
Directions
Fill a highball glass with ice. Add rum, top with coconut water. Insert straw. Relax.
